scripts.test_deploy_signs_upload: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_upload && functions deploy signs_upload --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_upload: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_upload && gcloud functions deploy signs_upload --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.test_deploy_signs_submit: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_upload && functions deploy signs_submit --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_submit: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_upload && gcloud functions deploy signs_submit --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.test_deploy_signs_approve: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && functions deploy signs_approve --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_approve: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && gcloud functions deploy signs_approve --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.test_deploy_signs_admin: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && functions deploy signs_admin --trigger-http
scripts.deploy_signs_admin: bin/prepare_deploy.sh && cd signs_admin && gcloud functions deploy signs_admin --region europe-west1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy_signs_upload && npm run deploy_signs_submit && npm run deploy_signs_approve && npm run deploy_signs_admin
scripts.test_deploy: npm run test_deploy_signs_upload && npm run test_deploy_signs_submit && npm run test_deploy_signs_approve && npm run test_deploy_signs_admin
